events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store but the size is completely wrong. I would like to request a refund as it doesn't fit at all.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to the incorrect size of the product received by the customer.
Support ticket assigned to agent Sarah J. for handling the refund case regarding the jacket size issue.
Hello! Sorry to hear about the sizing problem. I’m here to help you with the refund process for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original condition for the refund process?
Thank you for responding. My order number is 56789XYZ. The jacket is brand new with tags still attached and has not been worn.
Great! We will initiate your refund once you send the jacket back using our prepaid return label, which I will email to you shortly.
That sounds good, thank you for the clear instructions. I’ll wait for the return label and send the jacket back ASAP.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount will reflect on your payment method within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund successfully. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
